songs.title: Baddie
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]:
If you need a bad bitch then you know where to find me (hahahaha)
Young Money, let's go
Uh, Ayo

[Hook]: Megan Thee Stallion & Nicki Minaj
If you a bad bish put yo fuckin’ hands up (put em up)
If you a bad bish make it clap till' dat nigga give it up (give it boy)
If you a bad bish come on yea make sum noise (make it hoe)

[Verse 1]: Nicki Minaj
All I do is make it clap for him, make it clap for him
I know he want the pussy wet for him, make it wet for him
It seems as if you upcoming bitches getting full of ya self
I think you might wanna fix it cuz, ya fooling ya self
Look
If the bitch really bout it she would do what she say
But these bitches in reality be so damn fake
I'mma have to shut this shit down so they know I don’t play

[Hook]: Megan Thee Stallion & Nicki Minaj
If you a bad bish put yo fuckin' hands up (put em up)
If you a bad bish make it clap till' dat nigga give it up (give it boy)
If you a bad bish come on yea make sum noise (make it hoe)

[Verse 2]: Megan Thee
Aye, ooo
Tina Snow up in dis bich
Make him rub up on dis clit (ooo)
I know he like it real wet
I make him take off like a jet
Like I said before I'm a big ole freak
Yea my pussy stay clean like sum soap & water
These bitches ain't gonna make it far
So why even bother
You a dusty hoe you don't get it tho
You see my ass stack ya
He eat dis pussy tho
(ugh)

[Hook]: Megan Thee Stallion & Nicki Minaj
If you a bad bish put yo fuckin' hands up (put em up)
If you a bad bish make it clap till' dat nigga give it up (give it boy)
If you a bad bish come on yea make sum noise (make it hoe)
